nodes.text: Raab Rannon was a male Human who joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. He was assigned to the Research branch of the Alliance under Doctor Juvard Illip Oggurobb.

Raab Rannon appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as a Sith Inquisitor vendor inside Odessen base. He also appears outside the Republic Odessen base (non-actionable).
